GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Update Heifer Budget Stage Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Update Heifer Budget Stage Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Update Heifer Budget Stage Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATEHEIFERBUDGETSTAGE ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @FIELD1 nvarchar(1) ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @I integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), BUDGETID uniqueidentifier, DESIGNATIONID uniqueidentifier ) set @I = 1
insert into @T select id, designationid from usr_heiferbudgetstage where award='HPIAA000000000'
declare @BUDGETID uniqueidentifier declare @DESIGNATIONID uniqueidentifier
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T --set @I_MAX=5
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @BUDGETID = BUDGETID, @DESIGNATIONID = DESIGNATIONID from @T where PK = @I
-- handle REVENUE_YYYY fields for all years update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2014 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2014' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2013-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2014-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2015 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2015' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2014-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2015-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2016 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2016' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2015-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2016-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2017 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2022' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2021-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2022-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2023 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2023' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2022-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2023-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REVENUE_2024 = ( select revenue from ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID as [Designation ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR] as [FY], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[AMOUNT]) as [Revenue], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Application Details\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUEITEMS] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_ATTRIBUTE89662FAC4D144150B184F91503B51AAA] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].id = @DESIGNATIONID and FISCALYEAR='2024' /*SpecificDate*/ and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] >= '2023-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] < '2024-07-01T00:00:00.000') and ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUEID] = N'ca162a9a-9e3f-4bd1-af6c-98c4437817d4' or ([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] is null or [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Agresso - Award Number Attribute].[VALUE] = '')) group by [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID],[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].ID, [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Heifer Gifts].[FISCALYEAR], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[BASECURRENCYID] --order by [Lookup ID] asc ) as Table1 ) where id = @BUDGETID
set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1 set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE
----------------------------------------------------------------------- --Begin Modify fields that don't require looping through individual records - ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- handle RTBR_YYYY fields for all years -- RTBR_2014 = IIf([FY2014-Revenue] Is Not Null,[2014-Total]-[2014-Revenue],[2014-Total]) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RTBR_2014 = (select TOTAL_2014 - isnull(REVENUE_2014,0)) ,RTBR_2015 = (select TOTAL_2015 - isnull(REVENUE_2015,0)) ,RTBR_2016 = (select TOTAL_2016 - isnull(REVENUE_2016,0)) ,RTBR_2017 = (select TOTAL_2017 - isnull(REVENUE_2017,0)) ,RTBR_2018 = (select TOTAL_2018 - isnull(REVENUE_2018,0)) ,RTBR_2019 = (select TOTAL_2019 - isnull(REVENUE_2019,0)) ,RTBR_2020 = (select TOTAL_2020 - isnull(REVENUE_2020,0)) ,RTBR_2021 = (select TOTAL_2021 - isnull(REVENUE_2021,0)) ,RTBR_2022 = (select TOTAL_2022 - isnull(REVENUE_2022,0)) ,RTBR_2023 = (select TOTAL_2023 - isnull(REVENUE_2023,0)) ,RTBR_2024 = (select TOTAL_2024 - isnull(REVENUE_2024,0))
-- handle RUNNING_YYYY fields for all years (must start with 2015 since it uses previous years RTBR and table only goes back to 2014 -- RUNNING_2015 = IIf([2014-RTBR]>0,[2015-RTBR],([2015-RTBR]+[2014-RTBR])) -- test change to use previous year TOTAL_RTBR_YYYY field in calc. TOTAL_RTBR_YYYY starts with 2017 --update usr_heiferbudgetstage set -- RUNNING_2015 = (select case when RTBR_2014 > 0 then RTBR_2015 else RTBR_2015 + RTBR_2014 end) --,RUNNING_2016 = (select case when RTBR_2015 > 0 then RTBR_2016 else RTBR_2016 + RTBR_2015 end) --,RUNNING_2017 = (select case when RTBR_2016 > 0 then RTBR_2017 else RTBR_2017 + RTBR_2016 end) --,RUNNING_2018 = (select case when RTBR_2017 > 0 then RTBR_2018 else RTBR_2018 + RTBR_2017 end) --,RUNNING_2019 = (select case when RTBR_2018 > 0 then RTBR_2019 else RTBR_2019 + RTBR_2018 end) --,RUNNING_2020 = (select case when RTBR_2019 > 0 then RTBR_2020 else RTBR_2020 + RTBR_2019 end) --,RUNNING_2021 = (select case when RTBR_2020 > 0 then RTBR_2021 else RTBR_2021 + RTBR_2020 end) --,RUNNING_2022 = (select case when RTBR_2021 > 0 then RTBR_2022 else RTBR_2022 + RTBR_2021 end) --,RUNNING_2023 = (select case when RTBR_2022 > 0 then RTBR_2023 else RTBR_2023 + RTBR_2022 end) --,RUNNING_2024 = (select case when RTBR_2023 > 0 then RTBR_2024 else RTBR_2024 + RTBR_2023 end)
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RUNNING_2015 = (select case when RTBR_2014 > 0 then RTBR_2015 else RTBR_2015 + RTBR_2014 end) ,RUNNING_2016 = (select case when RTBR_2015 > 0 then RTBR_2016 else RTBR_2016 + RTBR_2015 end) ,RUNNING_2017 = (select case when RTBR_2016 > 0 then RTBR_2017 else RTBR_2017 + RTBR_2016 end) ,RUNNING_2018 = (select case when RTBR_2017 > 0 then RTBR_2018 else RTBR_2018 + TOTAL_RTBR_2017 end) ,RUNNING_2019 = (select case when RTBR_2018 > 0 then RTBR_2019 else RTBR_2019 + TOTAL_RTBR_2018 end) ,RUNNING_2020 = (select case when RTBR_2019 > 0 then RTBR_2020 else RTBR_2020 + TOTAL_RTBR_2019 end) ,RUNNING_2021 = (select case when RTBR_2020 > 0 then RTBR_2021 else RTBR_2021 + TOTAL_RTBR_2020 end) ,RUNNING_2022 = (select case when RTBR_2021 > 0 then RTBR_2022 else RTBR_2022 + TOTAL_RTBR_2021 end) ,RUNNING_2023 = (select case when RTBR_2022 > 0 then RTBR_2023 else RTBR_2023 + TOTAL_RTBR_2022 end) ,RUNNING_2024 = (select case when RTBR_2023 > 0 then RTBR_2024 else RTBR_2024 + TOTAL_RTBR_2023 end)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- End Modify fields that don't require looping through individual records - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- BEGIN Loop through query for RESERVATIONS_YYYY - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
declare @RESERVATIONS table ( PK int identity(1,1), LOOKUPID nvarchar(20), RESERVATIONAMOUNT money )
set @I = 1
insert into @RESERVATIONS select [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], sum([V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[GOAL]) as [Amount] -- [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[CAMPAIGNPRIORITYTYPECODE] as [Priorities\Type], -- [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Priorities\Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN] as [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATIONCAMPAIGN] as [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations] on [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN].[ID] = [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations].[CAMPAIGNID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations\Designation] on [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations\Designation].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CAMPAIGNPRIORITY] as [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities] on [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN].[ID] = [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[CAMPAIGNID] where ([V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[GOAL] is not null) group by [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Designations\Designation].[USERID], [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[CAMPAIGNPRIORITYTYPECODE], [V_QUERY_CAMPAIGN\Priorities].[BASECURRENCYID]
declare @LOOKUPID nvarchar(20) declare @RESERVATIONAMOUNT money
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @RESERVATIONS
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @LOOKUPID = LOOKUPID, @RESERVATIONAMOUNT = RESERVATIONAMOUNT from @RESERVATIONS where PK = @I
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2017 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2018 = isnull(@RESERVATIONAMOUNT,0) where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2019 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2020 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2021 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2022 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2023 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RESERVATIONS_2024 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID)
set @I = @I + 1 end
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- END Loop through query for RESERVATIONS_YYYY - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- BEGIN Loop through query for RESREVENUE_YYYY - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
declare @RESREVENUE table ( PK int identity(1,1), LOOKUPID nvarchar(20), RESREVENUEAMOUNT money )
set @I = 1
insert into @RESREVENUE select [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Designation].[USERID] as [Lookup ID], sum([V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[AMOUNT]) as [Amount] --[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Base currency ID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Designation].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLITCAMPAIGN] as [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Revenue Campaigns] on [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Revenue Campaigns].[REVENUESPLITID] where ([V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Revenue Campaigns].[CAMPAIGNSUBPRIORITYNAMECODEID_TRANSLATION] is not null and [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Revenue Campaigns].[CAMPAIGNSUBPRIORITYNAMECODEID_TRANSLATION] <> '') and [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[GLREVENUECATEGORYMAPPINGID] in (N'20ad98dc-4d7e-446b-a15d-965c8e1f2c16', N'de56f821-01b0-42ae-95a1-0c1f0847b083') group by [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT\Designation].[USERID], [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[BASECURRENCYID]
declare @LOOKUPID2 nvarchar(20) declare @RESREVENUEAMOUNT money
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @RESREVENUE
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @LOOKUPID2 = LOOKUPID, @RESREVENUEAMOUNT = RESREVENUEAMOUNT from @RESREVENUE where PK = @I
update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2017 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2018 = isnull(@RESREVENUEAMOUNT,0) where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2019 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2020 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2021 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2022 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2023 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2) update usr_heiferbudgetstage set RES_REVENUE_2024 = 0 where DESIGNATIONID = (select id from designation where userid=@LOOKUPID2)
--Set RES_REVENUE fields = 0 if reservations for that year have been set to zero
set @I = @I + 1 end
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- END Loop through query for RESREVENUE_YYYY - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------- --Begin Modify fields that don't require looping through individual records - ----------------------------------------------------------------------- -- handle REMAININGRES_YYYY fields for all years -- 2017-RemainingRes field = [2017-Reservations]-[2017-ResRevenue] update usr_heiferbudgetstage set REMAINING_RES_2017 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2018 = (select isnull(RESERVATIONS_2018,0) - isnull(RES_REVENUE_2018,0)) ,REMAINING_RES_2019 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2020 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2021 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2022 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2023 = 0 ,REMAINING_RES_2024 = 0
-- handle TOTALRTBR_YYYY fields for all years (must start with 2015 since it uses previous years RTBR and table only goes back to 2014 -- 2017-TotalRTBR field = IIf([2017-Reservations] Is Not Null,[2017-Running]-[2017-RemainingRes],[2017-Running]) -- I think we can say if 2017_Reservations Is Not Null or = zero for IIF update usr_heiferbudgetstage set TOTAL_RTBR_2017 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2017,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2017,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2017,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2017,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2018 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2018,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2018,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2018,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2018,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2019 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2019,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2019,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2019,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2019,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2020 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2020,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2020,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2020,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2020,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2021 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2021,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2021,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2021,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2021,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2022 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2022,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2022,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2022,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2022,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2023 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2023,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2023,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2023,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2023,0) end) ,TOTAL_RTBR_2024 = (select case when isnull(RESERVATIONS_2024,0) <> 0 then isnull(RUNNING_2024,0) - isnull(REMAINING_RES_2024,0) else isnull(RUNNING_2024,0) end)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- End Modify fields that don't require looping through individual records - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
